participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and insightful. Enjoys exploring nature and always eager to learn new things.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i'm an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and empathetic. Passionate about storytelling and helping others through her work.
participant_2.background: i read twenty books a year. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i only eat kosher. i was raised in a single parent household.
